publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-18 Janis Hughes: M74 Northern Extension—That the Parliament welcomes the proposed extension of the M74 motorway; notes the potential economic benefits of completing Scotland’s "missing link", including the creation and safeguarding of thousands of jobs; acknowledges that the construction of the M74 northern extension will reduce traffic in urban areas such as Rutherglen Main Street by up to 70%, and urges the Scottish Executive and the relevant local authorities to ensure that this extension is completed as soon as possible. Supported by: Bill Butler*
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Bristow Muldoon*, Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) Christine May*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S2M-18 Janis Hughes: M74 Northern Extension—That the Parliament welcomes the proposed extension of the M74 motorway; notes the potential economic benefits of completing Scotland’s "missing link", including the creation and safeguarding of thousands of jobs; acknowledges that the construction of the M74 northern extension will reduce traffic in urban areas such as Rutherglen Main Street by up to 70%, and urges the Scottish Executive and the relevant local authorities to ensure that this extension is completed as soon as possible. Supported by: Bill Butler, Ms Wendy Alexander, Bristow Muldoon, Margaret Jamieson, Christine May, Pauline McNeill, Mr Kenneth Macintosh
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) Karen Whitefield*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) Paul Martin*
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) David Mundell*, Mr Tom McCabe*
S2M-18 M74 Northern Extension (lodged on 13 May 2003) Helen Eadie*, Murray Tosh*
